sentences.sentence: Positive science deals only with phenomena, yet you are foolish enough to strive to be ontologists and to deal with noumena.
sentences.translation: 实证科学只能处理现象，而你们却很策，偏要努力去做本体论者，去研究本体。

sentences.sentence: And you probably don't require a 30-megabyte class library, a team of ontologists to design the object model, and dependencies on 15 other packages either.
sentences.translation: 可能并不需要30兆字节大小的类库、由一组本体专家(ontologists)来设计对象模型，或者依赖15个其他软件包。
